field.name: Any General Danger sign OR | Clouding of Cornea OR | Deep or extensive mouth ulcers
Counsel mother on pre-referral treatment and Referral
Give Vitamin A per table below:
Give first dose of an appropriate antibiotic after completing assessment
If patient has clouding of the cornea or pus draining from the eye, apply tetracycline eye ointment: Ask the child to look up and squirt a small amount of the ointment on the inside of the lower lid.
Fill out Referral Form & Refer the child to a health center or hospital IMMEDIATELY
Advise mother to not put the child on her back
Teach mother how to keep the child warm on the way to the health facility
Observe mother breastfeeding and counsel her on positioning and attachment if necessary
Counsel mother on feeding a sick child
Accompany mother and child to the health facility
Follow up with client after discharge from health center or hospital
